mapper.insert: insert into board(title, descript, nickname, file) values(#{title}, #{descript}, #{nickname}, #{savefile});
mapper.select: select num, title, nickname, date_format(date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as 'date' from board order by num asc limit #{startrow}, 10;
select num, title, nickname, date_format(date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as 'date' from function.board where title like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') order by num asc limit #{startrow}, 10;
select num, title, descript, nickname, file as 'savefile', date_format(date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %T') as 'date' from board where num = #{num};
select count(*) from board where title like CONCAT('%', #{parameter}, '%');
